author: MTV News Staff
title: Amy Klobuchar Wants to Save the Election From The Coronavirus
description: Senator Klobuchar speaks with MTV News about how her new legislation would impact young people’s voting rights in light of the pandemic.
content: With no known end date, theres a chance that coronavirus-related physical distancing measures could affect the November general election  and since millenials and Gen Z constitute the biggest voting bloc in 2020, young peoples voting rights are among the most… [+8832 chars]
